programme.title: Bayern München vs Internazionale - UEFA Champions League 2024/25 Quarter Finals - 1st Leg
programme.desc: This will be the 10th meeting between Bayern Munich and Internazionale in European competition, with the German side winning five of the previous nine, including the last time they faced each other in the UEFA Champions League. Internazionale have lost four of their seven games against Bayern Munich in the UEFA Champions League, but have eliminated them in both of their meetings in the knockout stages of the competition: 2-0 in the 2009-10 final and progressing on away goals over two legs in 2010-11 in the last 16.

programme.title: Rangers vs Athletic Club - UEFA Europa League 2024/25 - Quarter Final's 1st Leg
programme.desc: Rangers and Athletic Club faced in the 1968-69 Inter-Cities Fairs Cup in the quarter-final – the Gers won 4-1 in the first leg at home, before Athletic won 2-0 in the second leg, with the Scottish side going through 4-3 on aggregate. Athletic Club have lost both of their major European visits to Scotland, losing 1-0 to Dunfermline Athletic in 1965 and 4-1 to Rangers in 1969, both in the Inter-Cities Fairs Cup.

programme.title: Tottenham Hotspur vs Eintracht Frankfurt - UEFA Europa League 2024/25 - Quarter Final's 1st Leg
programme.desc: Tottenham Hotspur and Eintracht Frankfurt last faced in the UEFA Champions League group stages in 2022-23, with Spurs drawing 0-0 in Germany and winning 3-2 at the Tottenham Hotspur Stadium that season. The only previous European knockout meeting between Spurs and Eintracht Frankfurt was in the 1981-82 Cup Winners’ Cup quarter-final – Spurs won 2-0 at home before losing 2-1 away in the second leg, but progressed 3-2 on aggregate.

programme.title: PSG vs Aston Villa - UEFA Champions League 2024/25 Quarter Finals - 1st Leg
programme.desc: Paris SG and Aston Villa will meet for the first time in European competition, with this just the second UEFA Champions League quarter-final between French and English sides in the last eight campaigns. Paris SG eliminated Liverpool in the last 16 of this season’s UEFA Champions League, after having exited the competition in each of their last three knockout stage meetings with English sides.

programme.title: Barcelona vs Borussia Dortmund - UEFA Champions League 2024/25 Quarter Finals - 1st Leg
programme.desc: Barcelona are unbeaten in their five meetings with Borussia Dortmund in European competition, including a victory over them earlier in this season’s UEFA Champions League. Only against Lyon, Napoli and Werder Bremen have they played more in Europe without losing. While Borussia Dortmund haven’t won any of their five games against Barcelona, they’ve only gone six consecutive European matches without beating an opponent against two other sides; one of which is another Spanish team.

programme.title: Manchester United vs Olympique Lyonnais - UEFA Europa League 2024/25 - Quater Final's 2nd Leg
programme.desc: This will be the third time that Manchester United have faced Lyon in European competition at Old Trafford, with the Red Devils winning both prior meetings. Lyon have lost just one of their last nine European games against sides from England, a 3-0 defeat to West Ham during the 2021-22 UEFA Europa League.

programme.title: Athletic Club vs Rangers - UEFA Europa League 2024/25 - Quater Final's 2nd Leg
programme.desc: Athletic Club have only hosted Rangers once before, beating them 2-0 in the Fairs Cup in April 1969. The only other time Athletic have hosted a Scottish club was in two games against Dunfermline in 1965, also in the Fairs Cup, winning 1-0 and then 2-1 in a deciding game. Rangers won 3-2 away at Real Betis in their last European game in Spain, having gone 13 away games without winning there beforehand between 1962 and 2018.

programme.title: Crystal Palace vs Liverpool - FA Community Shield 2025
programme.desc: Live and exclusive only on beIN, the traditional curtain raiser to the English Premier League season, the FA Community Shield. The match will be between Liverpool FC and Crystal Palace FC, the winners of the previous season's Premier League and FA Cup. It will be played at Wembley Stadium, London.

programme.desc: Extended Highlights - UEFA Champions League 2024/25

programme.title: Secret of Success : Adam Ounass, A Symbol of Skill
programme.desc: At the beginning the signs of his distinction emerged , his talent and uniqueness set him apart , from childhood , he wrote the first letters of his success story. He practices , played and followed the path of learning striving hard and listening attentively to his coaches .When it s comes to discussing the best , ADAM OUNASS Is no different from other football enthusiasts , he has his preferences and tastes , yet he always refers to statistics relying on facts and career trajectories before forming an opinion. Adam Ounass in the secret of success spots on his very special career from the land of his birth to Qatar with Al Sadd team.

programme.title: EPL Stories 2025/2026 - BRUNO GUIMARÃES
programme.desc: Showcasing the personalities who have shaped the Premier League era, in each episode we tell their unique story that will be sure to engage and entertain all fans.

programme.title: England vs Spain - UEFA Women's EURO 2025 - Championship Switzerland - Final's
programme.desc: The UEFA Women's EURO 2025 – Championship is the 14th edition of the UEFA Women’s Championship, Switzerland is hosting the tournament from 2 till 27 July 2025 with 16 national teams competing to win the title.

programme.title: Crystal Palace vs Liverpool - FA Community Shield 2025
programme.desc: Live and exclusive only on beIN, the traditional curtain raiser to the English Premier League season, the FA Community Shield. The match will be between Liverpool FC and Crystal Palace FC, the winners of the previous season's Premier League and FA Cup. It will be played at Wembley Stadium, London.

programme.title: Arsenal vs PSG - UEFA Champions League 2024/25 Semi Finals - 1st Leg
programme.desc: This will be the sixth meeting between Arsenal and Paris SG, while the Gunners are unbeaten across the previous five. Arsenal are the opponent that the French side have faced the most times in European competition without ever winning. Arsenal have already beaten Paris SG in the UEFA Champions League this season, winning 2-0 at the Emirates Stadium in the league phase last October. Only one English side have beaten Paris SG twice in a single edition of the competition: Manchester City in the 2020-21 semi-finals.

programme.title: UEFA UCL Magazine2024/2025 - Season Review
programme.desc: A recap of the best of the action, plus a look forward to the next Match Day in Europe’s premium football competition, the UEFA Champions League. This season is the first in the new format, with 36 participating teams in a league phase replacing the previous Group stage. All matches from the UEFA Champions League are live and exclusive only on beIN.

programme.title: Crystal Palace vs Liverpool - FA Community Shield 2025
programme.desc: Live and exclusive only on beIN, the traditional curtain raiser to the English Premier League season, the FA Community Shield. The match will be between Liverpool FC and Crystal Palace FC, the winners of the previous season's Premier League and FA Cup. It will be played at Wembley Stadium, London.

programme.title: Bodø / Glimt vs Tottenham Hotspur - UEFA Europa League 2024/25 - Sime Final's 2nd Leg
programme.desc: In the history of the UEFA Europa League since its rebrand ahead of the 2009-10 season, there have been 92 instances of a side winning the first leg of a knockout match on home soil by a 2+ goal margin, of which only nine have failed to progress in the overall tie. All eight prior semi-finalists to achieve the feat have progressed to the final. Across their major European history, Bodø/Glimt have lost all four of their matches against English opposition, including their only one on home soil vs Arsenal in October 2022. Each of the other three defeats have seen the Norwegian side concede exactly three goals.

programme.title: EPL Stories 2025/2026 - BRUNO GUIMARÃES
programme.desc: Showcasing the personalities who have shaped the Premier League era, in each episode we tell their unique story that will be sure to engage and entertain all fans.

programme.title: Internazionale vs Barcelona - UEFA Champions League 2024/25 Semi Finals - 2nd Leg
programme.desc: This will be the 18th major European meeting between Internazionale and Barcelona, with only Bayern Munich vs Real Madrid, Juventus vs Real Madrid and Inter vs Real Madrid played more often in history. Each of the last two games between the teams have ended 3-3, in the UEFA Champions League in October 2022 and this season’s first leg. Barcelona have won just one of their six away UEFA Champions League matches against Internazionale, a 2-1 win in December 2019. Overall, Barca have managed just five wins in 24 away games in Italy, their lowest win ratio in any non-Spanish nation in the competition.

programme.title: PSG vs Arsenal - UEFA Champions League 2024/25 Semi Finals - 2nd Leg
programme.desc: PSG’s 1-0 win the first leg was their first ever victory in six attempts against Arsenal. Both of their home games against the Gunners have finished 1-1. Having been unbeaten in their first 13 away games against French sides in all competitions, Arsenal have now lost their last two visits against Rennes in 2019 and Lens in 2023.

programme.title: Athletic Club vs Manchester United - UEFA Europa League 2024/25 - Semi Final's 1st Leg
programme.desc: This is the first European meeting between Athletic Club and Manchester United since the 2011-12 UEFA Europa League last 16 – under Marcelo Bielsa, Athletic won both legs and eventually reached that season’s final. Manchester United have lost three out of four European matches against Athletic Club, with their one win coming back in February 1957 in the second leg of that season’s European Cup quarter-final, a 3-0 victory at Old Trafford which took them into the semi-final 6-5 on aggregate.

programme.title: Crystal Palace vs Liverpool - FA Community Shield 2025
programme.desc: Live and exclusive only on beIN, the traditional curtain raiser to the English Premier League season, the FA Community Shield. The match will be between Liverpool FC and Crystal Palace FC, the winners of the previous season's Premier League and FA Cup. It will be played at Wembley Stadium, London.

programme.title: EPL Season Preview - 2025/2026
programme.desc: All 380 matches from the English Premier league are live and exclusive only on beIN.All matches are available live with a choice of Arabic or English commentary.The season will consist of 33 weekends and five midweek rounds of matches.Liverpool are the defending champions, having won their second Premier League title.

programme.title: Arsenal vs PSG - UEFA Champions League 2024/25 Semi Finals - 1st Leg
programme.desc: This will be the sixth meeting between Arsenal and Paris SG, while the Gunners are unbeaten across the previous five. Arsenal are the opponent that the French side have faced the most times in European competition without ever winning. Arsenal have already beaten Paris SG in the UEFA Champions League this season, winning 2-0 at the Emirates Stadium in the league phase last October. Only one English side have beaten Paris SG twice in a single edition of the competition: Manchester City in the 2020-21 semi-finals.

programme.title: Barcelona vs Internazionale - UEFA Champions League 2024/25 Semi Finals - 1st Leg
programme.desc: Barcelona and Internazionale have faced each other on 16 previous occasions in Europe, with the Spanish side winning exactly half of those. They are winless in the most recent two, however, which came in the group stages of the 2022-23 UEFA Champions League. This will be just the second time Barcelona and Internazionale have met in the knockout stages of the European Cup/UEFA Champions League, with both coming precisely at the semi-final stage. The previous one – played in 2009-10 – saw José Mourinho’s Inter eliminate the reigning champions 3-2 on aggregate.

programme.title: PSG vs Internazionale - UEFA Champions League 2024/25 Final
programme.desc: This is the first ever competitive meeting between Inter and Paris SG. It’s also the second European Cup/UEFA Champions League final between an Italian and a French side, after Marseille beat Milan 1-0 in 1993 – the only time a French side has ever won the trophy. That final was also held in Munich. This is Inter’s seventh appearance in the European Cup/UEFA Champions League final, winning the trophy three times. They did lose their last final match, going down 1-0 against Manchester City in 2023.

programme.title: Crystal Palace vs Liverpool - FA Community Shield 2025
programme.desc: Live and exclusive only on beIN, the traditional curtain raiser to the English Premier League season, the FA Community Shield. The match will be between Liverpool FC and Crystal Palace FC, the winners of the previous season's Premier League and FA Cup. It will be played at Wembley Stadium, London.

programme.title: England vs Spain - UEFA Women's EURO 2025 - Championship Switzerland - Final's
programme.desc: The UEFA Women's EURO 2025 – Championship is the 14th edition of the UEFA Women’s Championship, Switzerland is hosting the tournament from 2 till 27 July 2025 with 16 national teams competing to win the title.

programme.title: Tottenham vs Manchester Utd - UEFA Europa League 2024/25 - Final
programme.desc: The 2024-25 UEFA Europa League final will be the sixth all-English major European competition final, and the third of those to involve Tottenham Hotspur, after the 1971-72 UEFA Cup final and the 2018-19 UEFA Champions League final. This will be the fourth UEFA Europa League final to be contested between two sides from the same nation, after 2011, 2012, and 2019.

programme.title: PSG vs Internazionale - UEFA Champions League 2024/25 Final
programme.desc: This is the first ever competitive meeting between Inter and Paris SG. It’s also the second European Cup/UEFA Champions League final between an Italian and a French side, after Marseille beat Milan 1-0 in 1993 – the only time a French side has ever won the trophy. That final was also held in Munich. This is Inter’s seventh appearance in the European Cup/UEFA Champions League final, winning the trophy three times. They did lose their last final match, going down 1-0 against Manchester City in 2023.

programme.desc: Live and exclusive only on beIN, the traditional curtain raiser to the English Premier League season, the FA Community Shield.
